story:
Campaign Pitch for Shirdi Sai Baba Book Publication for free distribution

Blog Url: http://bonjanrao.blogspot.in/

I am B. Janardhana Rao from Bangalore, India and am a retired senior officer in a bank. I belong to a family of staunch devotees of Sai Baba of Shirdi. I have collected, compiled and collated the information and the events about Sai Baba and his devotees by working on this project for the last about three years prior to compiling. There are 62 articles placed in the Blog including one article on Preface and another, the main article on Sai Baba. Out of the remaining 60 articles, 50 articles on each individual devotee of Baba who saw Baba in his mortal coil and out of the remaining 10 articles, 6 articles on staunch devotees of Baba, who did not have darshan of Baba in mortal coil. The articles contain the photos of the devotees except a very few.  Compiling articles on Baba’s devotees is nothing but compiling additional information on Baba. With a view to giving the historical authenticity to the events/miracles that took place at the Will of Baba, I have tried, to the extent possible, to link the happening of the event/miracle to the respective year with the events/miracles arranged in a chronological order. This is based on my research and perhaps this will be the first book (after printing) linking the happening of events/miracles to the respective years with such events in a chronological order.

The extensive study made by me about Baba, goes to confirm that Baba is a Perfect and Divine Satguru (Master) or Qutub (Sufi Master) representing all Gods who are subsumed in Baba. And it is for this reason that Baba had appeared in the forms of various Gods to different devotees when they visited Shirdi for Baba’s darshan including as Jesus Christ to Christians. For Baba, all religions were equal and Baba asked the people belonging to various religions to continue to have faith in the God of their choice. Baba was against religious syncretism and insularism. By his appearance Baba brought about total harmony between the Hindus and the Muslims and others belonging to other religions. The birth and parentage of Baba are shrouded in mystery and no person, however closely associated with Baba, expressed clearly and correctly in this regard. Nothing is known about his parents. Saint Namdev and Saint Kabir were not born like ordinary mortals. Namdev was found on the banks of Bhimrathi river and Kabir on the banks of Bhagirathi river. Similar was the case with Sai Baba who first manifested himself as a young lad of sixteen years under a neem tree in Shirdi. He did not have a name earlier. The perusal of the main article in the Blog will provide more details.

The Blog and readership: These articles have been placed some two years back in the Blog in the public domain for the viewers across the world to peruse. It is gratifying to note that more than 113,000 people resident in several countries including small islands, have so far read the articles till recently. It is all the more striking to know that the people in St.Martin, perhaps the smallest island in the world in the South-Eastern Caribbean Sea, having a population of about 38,000, have also felt the presence of Baba and are perusing the articles. Another similar island is Curaçao in Caribbean Sea where Baba’s presence is also felt. 

Countrywise readership details are given below with more than 50% in USA:

 60,000  US residents

 41,000  Indians

 12,000  people from Russia, Malaysia, Canada, Australia, UK, Germany, UAE, Moldova etc.

113,000  Total readership

Book publication for free distribution: Based on feedback, now I am thinking of publishing in India a book on Sai Baba containing about 400 pages with the financial assistance routed through a commendable crowdfund company, IndieGoGo as a medium for financial support for this noble cause of book publication for free distribution. With Baba’s Grace, I want to publish a book in English titled, “Sai Baba-Miracle Maharaj of Shirdi” and it will be a costly book but will not be priced! I want to get a few thousand copies of book, printed and want to distribute them freely to Baba’s devotees/visitors in several places. The very fact that I have placed all the articles in the public domain, indicates my selfless service in the propagation of Baba’s principles and philosophy with continuous updation till recently with some more additional important information.

Usefulness of the Book: A perusal of the articles in the book may make life happier as observed and expressed by several readers. I appeal to the reader-community, national and international to support the noble cause of publishing the book. I feel that the book will foster universal brotherhood among all the people belonging to different religions and regions and also stress on the need to develop harmony among all sections of the society. Baba’s philosophy stands for an egalitarian society free from religious bigotry, hatred, jealousy and ill-will. The bunch of articles provided in my Blog will throw lot of light on how Baba was/is helping the devotees during difficult situations at all times. The contributors across the world will be doing a service by contributing any amount for this purpose. I am confident that the contributors will make the project a grand success. The currency selected is USD ($). Indians can easily use gift route to convert into US dollars for transfer for funding. I am happy to observe about the popularity of my Blog in the sense that on an average about 200 people daily across the world in different countries are perusing the articles. With the support of readers in different countries, I am sure of meeting the target at an early date. While Baba himself might not be in favour of propaganda for the sake of aggrandizement, but still Baba perhaps desired wider publicity only in the best interest of the general public. In my opinion, Baba was/is always noted for bestowal of munificent largesse, temporal as well as spiritual, besides doing wonderful miracles in a routine way at the beck and call of the earnest devotees. For details, one can peruse the article, “Preface with Acknowledgements” in the Blog.

As regards perks in exchange for the contributions, I will offer the book (with my manual signature) on publication which will be completed early, to all the contributors. I will offer any perk like greeting cards, poster prints, albums, post cards, hats, stickers, t-shirts, American apparel, hoodies, ceramic mugs, laptop skins(all sizes),  mouse pad, unframed premium posters, iPhone cases, iPad cases, DVD, CD, MP3 version of song, pen set, toy, book. For prompt delivery, I am approaching Amplifier, manufacturer and shipper in USA (having partnership with IndieGoGo). I am also contacting online Fine Art America company, manufacturer and shipper in USA and U.K. These companies can ship the perks in other countries also. Contributors can select the design of their choice within the range applicable from out of an array of designs available with them.

As regards delivery of books on printing, for the contributors residing in USA, I can ship the books to my relatives in USA who can pass on to the respective contributors by post/courier. For other contributors residing in other countries, I will send them directly from the printing press or some other better alternative may be explored. Based on some cut-off point in respect of large contributions, I want to mention the names of highest contributors upto the cut-off point in the preface of the book, expressing thanks which will serve as a permanent acknowledgement.

My father-in-law, late Sri B.Umamaheswara Rao (B.U.Rao), a retired high ranking police officer, was a staunch devotee of Sai Baba and after his retirement, took up incessantly to the task of propagating the principles and philosophy of Sai Baba by starting a monthly magazine and later took up writing several books on Sai Baba. His wife, late Mrs.B.Mani Umamaheswara Rao was also equally devoted to Sai Baba and wrote some books on Sai Baba. B.U.Rao was suffering from heart valve trouble since a long time. He was lucky to get the Grace of Sai Baba who did a heart operation on Rao in a dream. The attending cardiologist at that time, took him for x-ray and scanning etc., and based on the medical records it was confirmed that Rao underwent a successful heart operation and thereafter Rao stopped using medicines. This is well known in the circles of Sai devotees in South India. I was a constant observer of several instances about Rao concerning Baba’s miracles including his life extension. There is one article in the Blog on Rao with his chest photo after operation which can be perused. Along with my in-laws, I have been visiting Shirdi with my family and met some of the devotees of Baba who saw Baba when he was in mortal coil. Several miracles have taken place in my family also. Details of miracles have been narrated in the article on compiler with his photo, placed in the Blog.

During Dec 1886 Baba told Mhalsapati that his life would leave his body and that he would rest in peace for three full days and that thereafter his life would come back to his physical body and advised him to protect his body during the three-day period without being moved and accordingly Baba got back his life after three days. This has comparison with the resurrection of Jesus Christ. For details, one can visit the article, “Mhalsapati” in the Blog.

Baba would get up very early in the morning and meditate for some time while sitting near the dhuni (holy fire). No one would be there and allowed inside the mosque or masjid at that time.  After some time he would chant words like, "Yaade Haq," "Allah Vali Hai," and "Allah Maalik Hai" and perform some yogic mudras by hands in between, signifying some communications with or directions to some unknown and perhaps to some invisible divine bodies.

Baba also said that one should have a Guru to live a happy life and achieve progress in life, temporal and spiritual. Baba was a Hindu fakir but bore the caste marks of a Hindu and was not circumcised and lived in a Hindu masjid called Dwarakamai (both expressions in oxymoron, a figure of speech). Baba was calling the masjid as Dwarakamai and there must be some significance about this name.  The significance is brought out by research done by the compiler based on publications brought out by B.V.Dev, K.Narayana Aiyar, Nagesh Vasudev Gunaji and Hemadri/Hemadpant and one can peruse the details in the article placed in the Blog under the name, “Baba’s Daily Routine”. 

Many devotees consider Baba as Lord Krishna. Baba used to appear as Lord Krishna to Bapusaheb Booty and Baba’s Marble Statue was installed in the Samadhimandir (place of interment) where the statue of Lord Krishna was originally proposed to be installed. Baba knew Sanskrit and many other languages and interpreted Bhagwat Gita stanzas with deep and subtle scholarly annotation. Samadhimandir thus proved to be perfectly the abode of Lord Krishna, who is none other than Baba himself in his present manifestation. Another instance about Jamnere miracle: Sai Baba himself came as a peon, tongawala and horses and managed and brought Ramgir Bua to Nanasaheb Chandorkar’s house in Jamnere and delivered Baba’s udhi and arati song at the time of difficult delivery of Chandorkar’s daughter. All these things had happened precisely and accurately to help the devotees at the exact right time. For details, one can visit the article in the Blog under the name, “Nanasaheb Chandorkar”. At one stage, Baba said, “I am your servant’s servant”, next said, “I am a servant of Allah” and again said, “I am He”. Human intellect fails to understand these statements but all these statements are facts as he displayed himself in all these multiple roles. In the case of Santaram Balwant Nachne (S.B.Nachne),  Baba helped his elder brother even though none of them knew about Baba. This is a case to show that Baba would help people even when they did not know Baba. Baba is also an Ocean of Compassion and there are a plethora of instances in support of Baba’s Compassion. One such instance is about S.B. Nachne who once started by train to go to Nasik and Baba appeared as Ganpat Shankar working as a peon in the Bombay Arts School, Andheri who accompanied Nachne to Nasik and took care of him in the entire journey by train. After returning to Andheri, Nachne wanted to meet him and went to the school and made enquiries and found to his surprise that there was no such person working in the school. This instance took place in 1929 after Baba’s mahasamadhi, indicating that Baba is active even after his mahasamadhi. For more details, one can visit the article in the Blog, “Santaram Balwant Nachne”. All these events bear eloquent testimony in support of the vigilant and continuous care of Baba for the welfare of the devotees.

Baba was Lord Shiva to Megha, the first priest to Baba who introduced the congregational worship to Baba. Once during a puja ritual, Megha took up the whole pot of holy water and turned it upside down over the head of Baba by way of abhisekam (pouring water on idol of God). Strangely, not a drop of water fell on the body of Baba. The whole water had fallen on the head only without touching Baba’s body. So, just as Siva (another Hindu God) had tied up Ganga river in his own tuft, Baba also used his head for retaining and throwing away the water so as not to touch his body or clothes. For details, one can visit the article in the Blog under name, “Megha”.

Upasani Baba who observed Baba from close quarters said: "Sai Baba is the unborn, the veritable Brahman (Supreme Lord)." Narke, the highest qualified devotee of Baba, was of the strong opinion that Baba was operating not only in this world but also in other worlds and that he was operating in an invisible form. Baba had full control over the Pancha-Maha-Bhute (five elements constituting the entire universe) and knew the future course of events and could mould them, concerning the devotees.

Baba also said that anyone could concentrate and meditate on Baba’s form or could also meditate on his Nirankara Swarup (Formless God). As per Baba's declaration, there is no difference between Baba and his photo. People who were unable to visit any Baba temple, can have a photo of Baba, if necessary by download from the internet and pray before Baba's photo as Baba's photo is tantamount to Baba being present in that photo. Any prayer to Baba's photo is the same as prayer offered to Baba himself. This is a fact which was proved in the case of Appasaheb Kulkarni. One can visit the article in the Blog under title, “Appasaheb Kulkarni”.

Many people came to test the divinity of Baba and once Thakkar came to Shirdi and tested Baba in several ways and got convinced that Baba was a real divine saint and that miracles were a matter of routine for him. For more details, one can visit the article, “Some atheists tested Baba for his saintly and supernatural powers” in the Blog.

When Baba’s articles are available in the internet, why do I want to publish them in a book shape? This is a good question and the answer is to enable the readers/other people to have these articles in the shape of a concomitant book, a memorabile, a thing worthy of rememberance. The book will not be priced and there will not be any price tag on the book to ensure free distribution.  The funds raised will be utilized for publishing the book while the articles placed in the public domain will continue to be as they are for continued viewing by the general public as usual.

The mosque was in a dilapidated condition which was not fit for inhabitation but Baba lived there and all the while Baba lived on begging food for himself and for others also. He used a brick as his pillow and was wearing tattered clothes. He took dakshina, small money-gifts from some of the devotees but gave away money to others more than what he received as money gifts, which was again shrouded in mystery. At the time he passed away by Mahasamadhi, he was having only Rs.16 enough for his funeral rites. Immediately after Mahasamadhi, Baba as usual was active, appearing in the dreams of the devotees and on the very next day, Baba appeared in a dream to Laxmanmama Joshi and asked him to come to the masjid and perform as usual the puja ritual to him. Baba also said that Jog, the usual priest would not come as he thought that Baba was dead. Joshi came and did puja to Baba (Baba’s Body) and performed puja as if Baba was alive. Later Jog  performed the noon arati and thus the arati rituals continued undisturbed. This indicates that Baba went only into Mahasamadhi and perhaps took death as a formality and transited to earlier Unmanifest(Infinite or Nirguna) State.

Baba had also declared in the masjid, “My bones will talk to you from my grave and keep immense faith in me. The eternal truth is I am always alive and this is my promise to you all, which you should never forget."  One can visit the article in the Blog under name, “Moreshwar. W. Pradhan” for details. In support of this declaration, there were/are many instances of miracles that took place after Baba’s Mahasamadhi.

Dixit had approached in 1922 the Ahmednagar District Court for permission to set up a Public Trust to administer the Baba’s shrine and got permission from the Court. At this stage, Abdul Baba, induced by some of his well wishers, approached the Court, claiming that he was the legal heir to Baba and that he had every right to manage the shrine. Baba during his life time, never mentioned any one as his successor. The Court held that there was no heir or successor to Baba, affirming the concept that there cannot be any successor to God.

Campaign Pitch for Shirdi Sai Baba Book Publication for free
distributionBlog Url: http://bonjanrao.blogspot.in/I am B. Janardhana Rao from
Bangalore, India and am a retired senior officer in a bank. I belong to a family of staunch devotees of Sai Baba of
Shirdi. I have collected, compiled and collated the information and the events
about Sai Baba and his devotees by working on this project for the last about
three years prior to compiling. There are 62 articles placed in the Blog
including one article on Preface and another, the main article on Sai Baba. Out of the remaining 60 articles, 50
articles on each individual devotee of Baba who saw Baba in his mortal coil and
out of the remaining 10 articles, 6 articles on staunch devotees of Baba, who
did not have darshan of Baba in mortal coil. The articles contain the photos of
the devotees except a very few.  Compiling articles on Baba’s devotees is
nothing but compiling additional information on Baba. With a view to giving the historical authenticity to the
events/miracles that took place at the Will of Baba, I have tried, to the
extent possible, to link the happening of the event/miracle to the respective
year with the events/miracles arranged in a chronological order.
This is based on my research and perhaps
this will be the first book (after printing) linking the happening of
events/miracles to the respective years with such events in a
chronological order.
The extensive study made by me about Baba, goes to
confirm that Baba is a Perfect and
Divine Satguru (Master) or Qutub (Sufi Master) representing all Gods who are
subsumed in Baba. And it is for this reason that Baba had appeared in the
forms of various Gods to different devotees when they visited Shirdi for Baba’s
darshan including as Jesus Christ to Christians. For Baba, all religions were
equal and Baba asked the people belonging to various religions to continue to
have faith in the God of their choice.
Baba was against religious syncretism and insularism. By his appearance Baba
brought about total harmony between the Hindus and the Muslims and others
belonging to other religions. The birth and parentage of Baba are shrouded in
mystery and no person, however closely associated with Baba, expressed clearly
and correctly in this regard. Nothing is known about his parents. Saint Namdev

earlier. The perusal of the main article in the Blog will provide more
details.

Mahasamadhi, Baba as usual was active, appearing in the dreams of the devotees
and on the very next day, Baba appeared in a dream to Laxmanmama Joshi and
asked him to come to the masjid and perform as usual the puja ritual to him.
Baba also said that Jog, the usual priest would not come as he thought that
Baba was dead. Joshi came and did puja to Baba (Baba’s Body) and performed puja
as if Baba was alive. Later Jog  performed the noon arati and thus the arati
rituals continued undisturbed. This indicates that Baba went only into
Mahasamadhi and perhaps took death as a formality and transited to earlier
Unmanifest(Infinite or Nirguna) State. 
Baba had also declared in the
masjid, “My bones will talk to you from my grave and keep immense faith in me.
The eternal truth is I am always alive and this is my promise to you all, which
you should never forget."  One can
visit the article in the Blog under name, “Moreshwar. W. Pradhan” for details. In support of this declaration, there
were/are many instances of miracles that took place after Baba’s Mahasamadhi.
Dixit had approached in 1922 the
Ahmednagar District Court for permission to set up a Public Trust to administer
the Baba’s shrine and got permission from the Court. At this stage, Abdul Baba,
induced by some of his well wishers, approached the Court, claiming that he was
the legal heir to Baba and that he had every right to manage the shrine. Baba
during his life time, never mentioned any one as his successor. The Court held
that there was no heir or successor to Baba, affirming the concept that there cannot be any successor to God.

story:
This is NOT the first foray into writing fiction for Melody Curtiss.  During her career as an author, Melody has penned many fine children's stories and young adult books like Abercrombie and Cornelius and the first two books (Naming and Wild Child) of the Magic of Lo trilogy.  What to Wear to the Revolution is not only Curtiss's most powerful piece of literature, it is also as important as any feminist composition written since women were given the right to vote in the USA. It is fashioned by the author's deep rooted belief in advancing gender equality for women around the planet and the dark realities of being female in less than 500 pages.  

What to Wear to the Revolution is uniquely feminist, a tribute to beauty queens who rule their families, make hard choices, and ensure the survival of the species.  Melody Curtiss writes that her novel is dedicated "to my daughter Sarah, a fashion princess with rebel tendencies" and to her mother "the beauty queen, my first and best literary critic and the heart of this story and mine."

Melody sent an advanced reader copy to her mom Eva in November as a 79th birthday surprise. Illness prevented Eva from reading it for two months. But on Februrary 17th Melody received a text saying Eva had finished the book and she gave it  a ten. Eva said she loved it so much that she had a hard time putting it down once she started reading. She assured Melody that they would talk later when she was feeling better. But she was wrong, later never came. Eva passed away within the week.

Melody is launching  her Mom's "10" on December 1, 2014. 

HELP MAKE IT HAPPEN! We don't want to wait until later to make this happen. Melody needs our help now. The money we donate will be spent on promotional materials, producing a book trailer to be shown in movie theaters, for production of audio books and advance reader copies and for her book tour.

Melody Curtiss is an incredible woman whose book and the personal story behind it will inspire women of all ages to reach for their dreams and be incredible themselves. As a feminist and women's rights advocate, this has been her life long quest. Your donation will move all of us toward the realization of this quest. 

Won't you please donate what you can and pass the word along to your friends and family.  Thank you.

You can find out more about her at www.melodycurtiss.com

FREQUENTLY ASKED QUESTIONS

Q:1 WHERE IS MY DONATION GOING?

A:1 The budget for this project looks like the following:

$1000  Rights to Cover Art

$5000  ARC (Advance Reader Copies) for book reviewers, bookstores, libraries

$5000  Production of Book Trailer

$5000  Movie, TV and Radio Advertising

$1000  Promotional materials (posters, bookmarks, postcards, business cards)

$2500  Local Launch Party

$8000  Book Tour

$5000  Production of Audio Books 

Q:2 HOW MUCH MONEY ARE YOU PUTTING INTO THIS PROJECT?

A:2 We are putting in $30,000 of our own money or a 50% match.

Q:3 WHERE CAN WE FIND SOME OF YOUR OTHER WORK?

A:3 Barnes & Noble, Amazon, it may be in your local library or directly from SarahRose Publishing.

story:
Why I wrote this book.

Return to Enchantment: Branding with Mythological Archetypes is designed to inspire entrepreneurs who crave more meaning in their business; and for any one who desires to find ways to connect their livelihoods with their sacred purpose in the world.

Return to Enchantment came to me when I realized how many entrepreneurs were burnt out and overwhelmed by the sheer magnitude of growing a business that’s both meaningful and profitable. 

I initially released the material in 2013 as a 12-week mastermind program and the results were phenomenal. The participants were finding it easier to write their marketing copy and discovered that their new material and ideas resonated more with their audience. 

As a result they made more sales and felt more at ease in their businesses.

Why I need your help.

I need your help to finish this book and birth it into the world!

I already completed my first round of edits in July and began the second round in August 2014. The cover has already been designed and you can see how gorgeous it is by visiting the Gallery.

Your contributions will help me cover the following costs: 

  • second and third round of edits;
  • formatting for all types of eBooks and softcover printing;
  • PR specialist;
  • Launch specialist;
  • Online advertising;
  • Offline advertising.

    The perks are yummy.

    You can donate as little as $5 and get your hands on the pdf eBook version! I also offer higher donation perks that include the printed softcover (where you can see your name in the acknowledgements) and my signature 1:1 strategy immersions:

    12 Months of Mermaid Magic - $25 (save $225 off of the regular price of $250)

    60 minute Siren Strategy Session - $150 (save $100 off of the regular price of $250)

    45-day PLUNGE - $450 (save $300 off of the regular price of $750)

      Just in case you're wondering.

      If I don't meet my funding goal this book WILL get completed, come hell or high water!

      So, if you choose any of the contribution packages you will get exactly what I've outlined for each perk NO MATTER WHAT.

        Can't contribute cash? 

        If you can't contribute money right now, you can still help.

        Share this campaign by using the Indiegogo tools across your social media networks and I will be FOREVER grateful.

story:
Let Me Introduce Myself....

(Vidi hrvatski prijevod u nastavku)

 

My name is Myles Marsden. I am an Internationally known dancer, teacher, choreographer  and Premier danseur formally with the Yugoslav National Ballet in Split in the 1950's. I am the founder of the very first civic ballet company in my home State of Rhode Island, called the State Ballet of RI. I was also their first Artistic Director and chief choreographer from 1959-1976. This was just a small part  of my career, so much more happened in-between and after that  makes up my story.

Today at age 78 I am retired from the stage and aside from being an author I am also an artist of whimsical characters, which I call Dancing Doodles. I refer to my drawings as the Art with a Heart  because I donate a portion of each sale from my   art to the American Heart Association, a charity that is very near and dear to me.


My wife Linda, who co-authored the book with me, finally finished writing my biography, which is the chronicles of my life and 63 years of my career. Wow! I never thought we’d get it done. It only took five and a half years of reminiscing with old friends from my past, researching, writing, erasing, rewriting and driving my wife absolutely crazy with details. It was all worth it though, and it turned out better than I imagined. This was not an easy book to write especially for Linda. It's my story in intimate detail, and it is important to me that I get to tell it, as you will understand  more after you read it. I have to give my wife credit for hanging in there with me throughout this process, composing my story while I relived this tumultuous journey through her. She listened for hours while I spoke about different events of my life. Some things she already knew and some things she was hearing for the first time. Some things uncomfortable, to say the least, but she never judged and I love her even more for that, she did a tremendous job."Thank you baby" 

My My book is included in PERKS $25-$50-$75-$100-$250-$500-$1000 and is signed by the authors. Available January 2015 and mailed out directly to you.

This is a story about following a dream that my mom and I had since 1952, overcoming struggles, reveling in successes, and just plain surviving many obstacles along the way. Writing this book has been an obsession to me over the past five years, it is filling a promise that I  made to my mother before she passed away.   I wrote about..... 

  •  Why my parents choose to send their 16 year old son 3459 miles away to  London in 1952, to attend an English boarding school.
  • What was was like being a young American teenager moving to communist Yugoslavia to live in 1953 and what brought me there and why I stayed
  • How it felt to lead the National Ballet of Split in Yugoslavia, as their Premier danseur in 1956, representing their country on their good will tour to Turkey and Istanbul, and being an American citizen in a socialist country during such difficult times.
  • Why I abruptly gave all this up after six years of hard work and moved back to America in 1958 when I was on top of the world with my career.
  • How I got so many influential people to volunteer their time working beside me and my mother, supporting our dream from 1952, how my mom and I fit my first wife into all of this, and what role she really did play.
  • How I survived after walking away from a successful Empire in 1976 that I built from scratch, why I took nothing with me and closed the door behind me.
  • How I dealt with the constant plagiarism of my 63 plus years legacy and the back stabbing from some of the people that were closest to me.
  • How I survived my third major heart attack, devastating financial loss, then cancer, all within a ten year span and still found the strength to go on at age 65.
  • How I coped going from financial success, being able to pick up the dinner check for a group of friends on any given day, to the  lowest point in my life where I waited in a line for my name to be called at the food bank to put dinner on the table.
  • How I finally found contentment in my life today after so many years of struggle and hard times

$50 PERK (valued at $75) 6x6 "TILE ART with easel 

Click on the GALLERY tab at top of page for details

Growing up I was academically challenged but the best of the best artistically.  In the beginning of the book I  talk about a prominent figure in the dance world who took me under his wing and mentored me throughout my career. Then in 1953 I was chosen as one of 6 students from 60 to move even further away from home to study with two more famous dance icons in Yugoslavia. I was the first American to attend the International Ballet School in Split, and the first boy to attend the school as well. I was considered one of the most outstanding dancers on the continent in 1955 then became the Premier danseur of the Yugoslav National Ballet in Split in 1956. Life couldn’t get much better than this. I talk about falling in and out of love many times,  and find myself making the best of a bad situation in late 1957 that brought me back home to America much too soon. I talk extensively and in detail about how I built an empire from scratch with the help and guidance from my mom and dad. Then, at my breaking point, alcohol and bad judgement took over my life and I found myself walking away from everything after seventeen years. These are just a few of the many stories I talk about in my book. My chronicle is not just a book for dance admirers, it's for everyone in any career field. It’s about life and how you play the cards your dealt, no matter how good or bad. And how quickly life can change your direction, in a heartbeat. I don’t just speak about the many high points in my life and career, I also share with the reader all the suffering and heartache that went along with it, on stage and off.

$75 PERK PILLOW ART (click on GALLERY tab at the top of the page to view in detail)


Where crowd funding comes into all this...

 I chose to  self publish my book, which is what most writers are doing these days. Self publishing allows the writer to steer the destination of his story, you the author has control. But on the downside you are also the financiers as well. I am working with a wonderful publishing company (Parker House Books.com) who is helping me produce a professionally finished product that will be printed in English and Croatian, in soft copy an a ebook and audio as well. Then there is the marketing end of the book. 

$100 PERK  (total value $300) this GICLEE PRINT is hand embellished (Click on the GALLERY tab at the top of the page to view in detail)


My estimated production costs of $7500 include...

Publishing Company production costs of formatting, editing, cover design. Marketing production costs that includes, book copies, book launch, book signings in Rhode Island, Nashville, New York, California, and translating  the book from English to Croatian making it available for all my Croatian readers as well. Also a portion of the proceeds will be donated to my favorite charity, The American Heart Association. Anything you can do to help me defray my costs would be great. If you are financially handicapped at this time, which I totally understand having been there myself many times, you can also help me by spreading the word to your friends and sharing the link to this site.  Ask them to please share this link as well.

$500 PERK  blended trio of Original Art 3-11x14 inch pieces (total wall space 33x42) Click on the GALLERY tab at the top of the page for more details


My Perks for helping me out, a Win, Win situation...

I really like the idea of the PERKS, it's  actually what hooked me into this whole campaign idea. I don't feel as uncomfortable asking for your help because I know I am giving you something of quality in return and well worth your support, whichever PERK you choose.  In most of my PERKS you receive the book  and a piece of my art from my collection, in one form or another. The process is really simple, on the right side of the page find a PERK that  interests you, in an amount that your budget allows. Then in a few clicks, via a safe transaction of your credit/debit card, Viola! you did a really nice thing  for me and I will be forever grateful.  Your Art, Prints, and Pillows will all arrive to you by mid December, in time for the Holidays, just incase you choose to give it away as a gift. NOTE: The book is still in the publication stage, we are expecting a January 2015 launch, and then sent right out to you. We will keep you informed. IMPORTANT: If you choose a PERK that has a number next to each item (tiles, Giclee print, pillows) don't forget to to put the number you choose when your filling out the shipping information. Just put it on line 2 of the address.
Thank you for reading this far please share this with your friends; on Facebook, by email, or face to face, that alone will help me out tremendously, and let me alsoThank You in advance for helping me get my story out there. I really do appreciate it from the bottom of my heart, and I hope you enjoy it.
Peace and Happiness  ~ Linda and Myles Marsden 


- HRVATSKA VERZIJA -

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Mediji koji su popratili ovu kampanju:


Dopustite mi da se predstavim ...

 

Moje ime je Myles Marsden . Ja sammeđunarodno poznati plesač , učitelj , koreograf, premijer danseur formalno Jugoslavenske narodne Baleta u Splitu u 1950 . Ja sam utemeljitelj prvog građanskog Baletna trupa u mom rodnom državi Rhode Island , pod nazivomDržavna Balet RI . Također sam bio njihov prvi umjetnički ravnatelj i glavni koreograf 1959-1976 . Ovo je samomali dio moje karijere , toliko više se dogodilo između te nakon toga čini moju priču .

Danas je u dobi od 78 sam povukao s pozornice, a osim što jean autor sam ian umjetnik hirovitih likova koje sam poziv Dancing Doodles. Mislim na moje crteže kao umjetnosti sa srcem, jer sam donirati dio svake prodaje iz moje umjetnosti na American Heart Association, ljubavi koja je vrlo blizu i dragi u mene.

Moja supruga Linda, koji je koautor knjige sa mnom, konačno završio pisanje moju biografiju, što je kronike mog života i 63 godina moje karijere. Wow! Nikad nisam mislio da ćemo dobiti to učinio. Trebala je samo pet i pol godina prisjećajući se sa starim prijateljima iz moje prošlosti, istraživanje, pisanje, brisanje, prepisivanjem i vožnje moja supruga apsolutno ludo s detaljima. To je sve to vrijedi iako, i ispalo je bolje nego što sam zamišljao. To nije biloan lako knjiga napisati posebno za Lindom. To je moja priča u intimne detalje, a to je važno za mene da sam se to reći, jer ćete shvatiti više nakon što ga pročitate. Moram dati svoju suprugu kredit za visi tamo sa mnom u cijelom ovom procesu, skladanje moju priču dok sam oživjeli ovaj burno putovanje kroz nju. Slušala satima dok sam govorio o različitim događajima u mom životu. Neke stvari je već znao i neke stvari koje je čula po prvi put. Neke stvari neugodno, u najmanju ruku, ali ona nikad nije sudio a volim ju još više za to, ona je ogroman posao. "Hvala vam bebu"

Ovo jea priča o tome slijedi san da je moja mama i ja imao od 1952. godine, prevladavanje borbe, uživajući u uspjesima, a samo običan preživjeli mnoge prepreke na putu. Pišući ovu knjigu bilaan opsesija mi se u proteklih pet godina, to je punjenje obećanje koje sam napravio na moju majku prije nego što je preminuo.

Postoji toliko mnogo neodgovorenih pitanja koja treba riješiti, počevši sa samo tih nekoliko navedene u nastavku.

  •   Zašto moji roditelji odlučite poslati svoje 16-godišnji sin 3.459 milja daleko u London 1952. godine, da prisustvuju engleskom škola?
  • Ono što ga je kao daa mladi američki tinejdžer seli u komunističkoj Jugoslaviji živjeti 1953. godine, a ono što me doveo tamo i zašto sam ostao?
  • Kakav je bio osjećaj voditi nacionalni balet Splita kao njihov Premier danseur 1956. godine, što predstavlja svoju zemlju na njihovu dobrobit će obići u Tursku i Istanbul, kaoan američki državljanin u socijalističkoj zemlji u tako teškim vremenima?
  • Zašto sam se naglo dati sve ovo gore nakon šest godina napornog rada i preseliti natrag u Ameriku 1958. godine, kada sam bio na vrhu svijeta s moje karijere?
  • Kako sam se toliko utjecajni ljudi volontiraju svoje vrijeme na posao pored mene i podršku moje majke i moj san 1959. godine, gdje je moja prva supruga uklapaju u sve ovo, koju ulogu je ona igrati i kako?
  • Kako sam preživjela nakon hodanja od uspješne carstva u 1976 koji sam sagradio od nule, a zašto sam uzeti ništa sa mnom i zatvorite vrata za sobom?
  • Kako se bavila sam se sa stalnim plagiranje mog 50 plus godina nasljeđe i leđa ubadanje od nekih ljudi koji su bili najbliži mi?
  • Kako sam preživjela svoj treći veliki srčani udar, razorne financijske gubitke, zatim rak, sve u razmaku od deset godina i još uvijek pronaći snage za odlaskom na 65 godina?
  • Kako sam nositi ide od financijskog uspjeha, biti u mogućnosti pokupiti večera ček za grupu prijatelja na bilo koji dan, do najniže točke u mom životu gdje sam čekao u redu za moje ime da se zove na hranu banke staviti večeru na stol?
  • Kako sam konačno naći zadovoljstvo u životu i danas, nakon toliko godina borbe i teškim vremenima?
  • To su samo neka od mnogih pitanja koje sam obratio. To je nemoguće dati jednostavan i kratak odgovor na pitanja poput ovih. Umjesto toga, govorim o njima u dubini cijeloj knjizi?

Odrastanje sam akademski je izazvao, alithe najbolji od najboljih umjetnički. Na početku knjige govorim o istaknutom figura u plesnom svijetu koji me je uzeo pod svoje okrilje, a mi mentorstvom cijeloj mojoj karijeri. Onda je 1953. sam bio izabran kao jedan od 6 studenata iz 60 pomaknuti još dalje od kuće na studij s dva više poznatih plesnih ikona u Jugoslaviji. Bio samthe prvi Amerikanac prisustvovati International Ballet School u Splitu, athe prvi dječak pohađati školu, kao dobro. Bio sam smatra jednim od najistaknutijih plesača na kontinentu 1955. a zatim je postaothe premijer danseur Jugoslavenske narodne Baleta u Splitu u 1956. životu nije mogao dobiti puno bolje od ovoga. Govorim o pada i iz ljubavi mnogo puta, i naći sebe štothe najbolje lošem stanju krajem 1957 koja me vratila kući u Ameriku puno prerano. Opsežno i detaljno o tome kako sam izgradio carstvo od nule uz pomoć i vodstvo od moje mama i tata sam razgovarati. Zatim, na moje točke pucanja, alkohol i loša prosudba preuzeo je moj život i našla sam se udaljavati od svega nakon sedamnaest godina. Ovo su samoa neke od brojnih priča koje sam razgovor u mojoj knjizi. Moja kronika nije samoa knjiga za ljubitelje plesa, to je za sve u bilo kojem polju karijere. Riječ je o životu i kako igrate kartice svoje bavila, bez obzira koliko dobro ili loše. A koliko brzo život može promijeniti svoj smjer, u srca. Ne samo govoriti o mnogim visokim mjestima u mom životu i karijeri, također sam podijeliti s čitateljima svethe patnje i bol u srcu koji je otišao zajedno s njim, na pozornici i izvan.

Gdje Publika financiranje dolazi u sve to ...

  Odlučila sam sebi objaviti svoju knjigu, što je ono što većina pisaca rade ovih dana. Samostalno objavljivanje omogućujethe pisac upravljati odredište njegove priče, kojuthe autor ima kontrolu. No, na minus što su i financijeri kao dobro. Radim s prekrasnim izdavačkoj kući (Parker House Books.com), koji pomaže mi proizvodimo profesionalno gotov proizvod koji će biti tiskani na engleskom i hrvatskom jeziku, u mekom primjerkuana knjiga kao dobro. Zatim tu jethe marketinški kraj knjige.

Moje procijenjeni troškovi proizvodnje 7500 dolara su ...

Izdavaštvo Tvrtka troškovi proizvodnje oblikovanje, uređivanje, dizajna naslovnice. Marketing troškove proizvodnje koji uključuje, knjiga primjeraka, knjiga lansiranje, potpisivanje knjiga u Rhode Island, Nashville, New Yorku, Kaliforniji, a prevodio s engleskog na hrvatski jezik što je na raspolaganju za sve moje hrvatske čitatelje, kao dobro. Također,a dio sredstava bit će doniran u dobrotvorne svrhe, moj omiljeni The American Heart Association.

Sve što mogu učiniti da mi pomogne namiriti svoje troškove bi bilo sjajno. Ako ste financijski hendikepirani u ovom trenutku, što sam potpuno razumio što sam bio tamo, možete mi pomoći šireći riječ svojim prijateljima i dijeljenje link na ovu stranicu. Stvarno mi se sviđa ideja o pogodnostima, to je ono što me povezao u cijeloj ovoj ideji. Ne osjećam se kao neugodno pitati za pomoć jer znam da dajem vam nešto kvalitete u povratku i dobro vrijedi vaše potpore, ovisno o tome razmetati se odlučite. U većini mojih Perks primite knjigu i komad moje umjetnosti iz moje kolekcije, u jednom ili drugom obliku.ThePostupak je vrlo jednostavan, nathe desnoj strani stranice pronaći razmetati koja vas zanima, u iznosu koji je vaš proračun dopušta. Tada se u nekoliko klikova, preko sigurne transakcije vaše kreditne / debitne kartice, Viola! jesi jako lijepo stvar za mene i ja ću biti vječno zahvalan. Vaši Umjetnost, Ispisuje i Jastuci sve će stići do vas sredinom prosinca, na vrijeme za blagdane, samo obložiti odlučite da ga dati kao dar. story_txt:
Let Me Introduce Myself....
(Vidi hrvatski prijevod u nastavku)



 
My name is Myles Marsden. I am an Internationally known dancer, teacher, choreographer  and Premier danseur formally with the Yugoslav National Ballet in Split in the 1950's. I am the founder of the very first civic ballet company in my home State of Rhode Island, called the State Ballet of RI. I was also their first Artistic Director and chief choreographer from 1959-1976. This was just a small part  of my career, so much more happened in-between and after that  makes up my story.

Today at age 78 I am retired from the stage and aside from being an author I am also an artist of whimsical characters, which I call Dancing Doodles. I refer to my drawings as the Art with a Heart  because I donate a portion of each sale from my   art to the American Heart Association, a charity that is very near and dear to me.


My wife Linda, who co-authored the book with me, finally finished writing my biography, which is the chronicles of my life and 63 years of my career. Wow! I never thought we’d get it done. It only took five and a half years of reminiscing with old friends from my past, researching, writing, erasing, rewriting and driving my wife absolutely crazy with details. It was all worth it though, and it turned out better than I imagined. This was not an easy book to write especially for Linda. It's my story in intimate detail, and it is important to me that I get to tell it, as you will understand  more after you read it. I have to give my wife credit for hanging in there with me throughout this process, composing my story while I relived this tumultuous journey through her. She listened for hours while I spoke about different events of my life. Some things she already knew and some things she was hearing for the first time. Some things uncomfortable, to say the least, but she never judged and I love her even more for that, she did a tremendous job."Thank you baby" 
My My book is included in PERKS $25-$50-$75-$100-$250-$500-$1000 and is signed by the authors. Available January 2015 and mailed out directly to you.

This is a story about following a dream that my mom and I had since 1952, overcoming struggles, reveling in successes, and just plain surviving many obstacles along the way. Writing this book has been an obsession to me over the past five years, it is filling a promise that I  made to my mother before she passed away.   I wrote about..... 



 Why my parents choose to send their 16 year old son 3459 miles away to  London in 1952, to attend an English boarding school.
What was was like being a young American teenager moving to communist Yugoslavia to live in 1953 and what brought me there and why I stayed
How it felt to lead the National Ballet of Split in Yugoslavia, as their Premier danseur in 1956, representing their country on their good will tour to Turkey and Istanbul, and being an American citizen in a socialist country during such difficult times.
Why I abruptly gave all this up after six years of hard work and moved back to America in 1958 when I was on top of the world with my career.
How I got so many influential people to volunteer their time working beside me and my mother, supporting our dream from 1952, how my mom and I fit my first wife into all of this, and what role she really did play.
How I survived after walking away from a successful Empire in 1976 that I built from scratch, why I took nothing with me and closed the door behind me.
How I dealt with the constant plagiarism of my 63 plus years legacy and the back stabbing from some of the people that were closest to me.
How I survived my third major heart attack, devastating financial loss, then cancer, all within a ten year span and still found the strength to go on at age 65.
How I coped going from financial success, being able to pick up the dinner check for a group of friends on any given day, to the  lowest point in my life where I waited in a line for my name to be called at the food bank to put dinner on the table.
How I finally found contentment in my life today after so many years of struggle and hard times






$50 PERK (valued at $75) 6x6 "TILE ART with easel 
Click on the GALLERY tab at top of page for details
Growing up I was academically challenged but the best of the best artistically.  In the beginning of the book I  talk about a prominent figure in the dance world who took me under his wing and mentored me throughout my career. Then in 1953 I was chosen as one of 6 students from 60 to move even further away from home to study with two more famous dance icons in Yugoslavia. I was the first American to attend the International Ballet School in Split, and the first boy to attend the school as well. I was considered one of the most outstanding dancers on the continent in 1955 then became the Premier danseur of the Yugoslav National Ballet in Split in 1956. Life couldn’t get much better than this. I talk about falling in and out of love many times,  and find myself making the best of a bad situation in late 1957 that brought me back home to America much too soon. I talk extensively and in detail about how I built an empire from scratch with the help and guidance from my mom and dad. Then, at my breaking point, alcohol and bad judgement took over my life and I found myself walking away from everything after seventeen years. These are just a few of the many stories I talk about in my book. My chronicle is not just a book for dance admirers, it's for everyone in any career field. It’s about life and how you play the cards your dealt, no matter how good or bad. And how quickly life can change your direction, in a heartbeat. I don’t just speak about the many high points in my life and career, I also share with the reader all the suffering and heartache that went along with it, on stage and off.






$75 PERK PILLOW ART (click on GALLERY tab at the top of the page to view in detail)


Where crowd funding comes into all this...
 I chose to  self publish my book, which is what most writers are doing these days. Self publishing allows the writer to steer the destination of his story, you the author has control. But on the downside you are also the financiers as well. I am working with a wonderful publishing company (Parker House Books.com) who is helping me produce a professionally finished product that will be printed in English and Croatian, in soft copy an a ebook and audio as well. Then there is the marketing end of the book. 



$100 PERK  (total value $300) this GICLEE PRINT is hand embellished (Click on the GALLERY tab at the top of the page to view in detail)



My estimated production costs of $7500 include...


Publishing Company production costs of formatting, editing, cover design. Marketing production costs that includes, book copies, book launch, book signings in Rhode Island, Nashville, New York, California, and translating  the book from English to Croatian making it available for all my Croatian readers as well. Also a portion of the proceeds will be donated to my favorite charity, The American Heart Association. Anything you can do to help me defray my costs would be great. If you are financially handicapped at this time, which I totally understand having been there myself many times, you can also help me by spreading the word to your friends and sharing the link to this site.  Ask them to please share this link as well.



$500 PERK  blended trio of Original Art 3-11x14 inch pieces (total wall space 33x42) Click on the GALLERY tab at the top of the page for more details

My Perks for helping me out, a Win, Win situation...
I really like the idea of the PERKS, it's  actually what hooked me into this whole campaign idea. I don't feel as uncomfortable asking for your help because I know I am giving you something of quality in return and well worth your support, whichever PERK you choose.  In most of my PERKS you receive the book  and a piece of my art from my collection, in one form or another. The process is really simple, on the right side of the page find a PERK that  interests you, in an amount that your budget allows. Then in a few clicks, via a safe transaction of your credit/debit card, Viola! you did a really nice thing  for me and I will be forever grateful.  Your Art, Prints, and Pillows will all arrive to you by mid December, in time for the Holidays, just incase you choose to give it away as a gift. NOTE: The book is still in the publication stage, we are expecting a January 2015 launch, and then sent right out to you. We will keep you informed. IMPORTANT: If you choose a PERK that has a number next to each item (tiles, Giclee print, pillows) don't forget to to put the number you choose when your filling out the shipping information. Just put it on line 2 of the address.
Thank you for reading this far please share this with your friends; on Facebook, by email, or face to face, that alone will help me out tremendously, and let me alsoThank You in advance for helping me get my story out there. I really do appreciate it from the bottom of my heart, and I hope you enjoy it.
Peace and Happiness  ~ Linda and Myles Marsden 





- HRVATSKA VERZIJA -
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------Mediji koji su popratili ovu kampanju:



Dopustite mi da se predstavim ...

 

Moje ime je Myles Marsden . Ja sammeđunarodno poznati plesač , učitelj , koreograf, premijer danseur formalno Jugoslavenske narodne Baleta u Splitu u 1950 . Ja sam utemeljitelj prvog građanskog Baletna trupa u mom rodnom državi Rhode Island , pod nazivomDržavna Balet RI . Također sam bio njihov prvi umjetnički ravnatelj i glavni koreograf 1959-1976 . Ovo je samomali dio moje karijere , toliko više se dogodilo između te nakon toga čini moju priču .




Danas je u dobi od 78 sam povukao s pozornice, a osim što jean autor sam ian umjetnik hirovitih likova koje sam poziv Dancing Doodles. Mislim na moje crteže kao umjetnosti sa srcem, jer sam donirati dio svake prodaje iz moje umjetnosti na American Heart Association, ljubavi koja je vrlo blizu i dragi u mene.




Moja supruga Linda, koji je koautor knjige sa mnom, konačno završio pisanje moju biografiju, što je kronike mog života i 63 godina moje karijere. Wow! Nikad nisam mislio da ćemo dobiti to učinio. Trebala je samo pet i pol godina prisjećajući se sa starim prijateljima iz moje prošlosti, istraživanje, pisanje, brisanje, prepisivanjem i vožnje moja supruga apsolutno ludo s detaljima. To je sve to vrijedi iako, i ispalo je bolje nego što sam zamišljao. To nije biloan lako knjiga napisati posebno za Lindom. To je moja priča u intimne detalje, a to je važno za mene da sam se to reći, jer ćete shvatiti više nakon što ga pročitate. Moram dati svoju suprugu kredit za visi tamo sa mnom u cijelom ovom procesu, skladanje moju priču dok sam oživjeli ovaj burno putovanje kroz nju. Slušala satima dok sam govorio o različitim događajima u mom životu. Neke stvari je već znao i neke stvari koje je čula po prvi put. Neke stvari neugodno, u najmanju ruku, ali ona nikad nije sudio a volim ju još više za to, ona je ogroman posao. "Hvala vam bebu"
Ovo jea priča o tome slijedi san da je moja mama i ja imao od 1952. godine, prevladavanje borbe, uživajući u uspjesima, a samo običan preživjeli mnoge prepreke na putu. Pišući ovu knjigu bilaan opsesija mi se u proteklih pet godina, to je punjenje obećanje koje sam napravio na moju majku prije nego što je preminuo.
Postoji toliko mnogo neodgovorenih pitanja koja treba riješiti, počevši sa samo tih nekoliko navedene u nastavku.


  Zašto moji roditelji odlučite poslati svoje 16-godišnji sin 3.459 milja daleko u London 1952. godine, da prisustvuju engleskom škola?
Ono što ga je kao daa mladi američki tinejdžer seli u komunističkoj Jugoslaviji živjeti 1953. godine, a ono što me doveo tamo i zašto sam ostao?
Kakav je bio osjećaj voditi nacionalni balet Splita kao njihov Premier danseur 1956. godine, što predstavlja svoju zemlju na njihovu dobrobit će obići u Tursku i Istanbul, kaoan američki državljanin u socijalističkoj zemlji u tako teškim vremenima?
Zašto sam se naglo dati sve ovo gore nakon šest godina napornog rada i preseliti natrag u Ameriku 1958. godine, kada sam bio na vrhu svijeta s moje karijere?
Kako sam se toliko utjecajni ljudi volontiraju svoje vrijeme na posao pored mene i podršku moje majke i moj san 1959. godine, gdje je moja prva supruga uklapaju u sve ovo, koju ulogu je ona igrati i kako?
Kako sam preživjela nakon hodanja od uspješne carstva u 1976 koji sam sagradio od nule, a zašto sam uzeti ništa sa mnom i zatvorite vrata za sobom?
Kako se bavila sam se sa stalnim plagiranje mog 50 plus godina nasljeđe i leđa ubadanje od nekih ljudi koji su bili najbliži mi?
Kako sam preživjela svoj treći veliki srčani udar, razorne financijske gubitke, zatim rak, sve u razmaku od deset godina i još uvijek pronaći snage za odlaskom na 65 godina?
Kako sam nositi ide od financijskog uspjeha, biti u mogućnosti pokupiti večera ček za grupu prijatelja na bilo koji dan, do najniže točke u mom životu gdje sam čekao u redu za moje ime da se zove na hranu banke staviti večeru na stol?
Kako sam konačno naći zadovoljstvo u životu i danas, nakon toliko godina borbe i teškim vremenima?

To su samo neka od mnogih pitanja koje sam obratio. To je nemoguće dati jednostavan i kratak odgovor na pitanja poput ovih. Umjesto toga, govorim o njima u dubini cijeloj knjizi?


Odrastanje sam akademski je izazvao, alithe najbolji od najboljih umjetnički. Na početku knjige govorim o istaknutom figura u plesnom svijetu koji me je uzeo pod svoje okrilje, a mi mentorstvom cijeloj mojoj karijeri. Onda je 1953. sam bio izabran kao jedan od 6 studenata iz 60 pomaknuti još dalje od kuće na studij s dva više poznatih plesnih ikona u Jugoslaviji. Bio samthe prvi Amerikanac prisustvovati International Ballet School u Splitu, athe prvi dječak pohađati školu, kao dobro. Bio sam smatra jednim od najistaknutijih plesača na kontinentu 1955. a zatim je postaothe premijer danseur Jugoslavenske narodne Baleta u Splitu u 1956. životu nije mogao dobiti puno bolje od ovoga. Govorim o pada i iz ljubavi mnogo puta, i naći sebe štothe najbolje lošem stanju krajem 1957 koja me vratila kući u Ameriku puno prerano. Opsežno i detaljno o tome kako sam izgradio carstvo od nule uz pomoć i vodstvo od moje mama i tata sam razgovarati. Zatim, na moje točke pucanja, alkohol i loša prosudba preuzeo je moj život i našla sam se udaljavati od svega nakon sedamnaest godina. Ovo su samoa neke od brojnih priča koje sam razgovor u mojoj knjizi. Moja kronika nije samoa knjiga za ljubitelje plesa, to je za sve u bilo kojem polju karijere. Riječ je o životu i kako igrate kartice svoje bavila, bez obzira koliko dobro ili loše. A koliko brzo život može promijeniti svoj smjer, u srca. Ne samo govoriti o mnogim visokim mjestima u mom životu i karijeri, također sam podijeliti s čitateljima svethe patnje i bol u srcu koji je otišao zajedno s njim, na pozornici i izvan.
Gdje Publika financiranje dolazi u sve to ...
  Odlučila sam sebi objaviti svoju knjigu, što je ono što većina pisaca rade ovih dana. Samostalno objavljivanje omogućujethe pisac upravljati odredište njegove priče, kojuthe autor ima kontrolu. No, na minus što su i financijeri kao dobro. Radim s prekrasnim izdavačkoj kući (Parker House Books.com), koji pomaže mi proizvodimo profesionalno gotov proizvod koji će biti tiskani na engleskom i hrvatskom jeziku, u mekom primjerkuana knjiga kao dobro. Zatim tu jethe marketinški kraj knjige.

Izdavaštvo Tvrtka troškovi proizvodnje oblikovanje, uređivanje, dizajna naslovnice. Ja stvarno ne cijenim ga iz sveg srca, a nadam se da ćete uživati u njoj.
Mir i sreća ~ Linda i Myles Marsden

story:
Why write Scratch, Crackle and Pop! 

 

As I spend more time presenting my films at workshops, master classes and retrospectives, I field an ever-increasing amount of questions from my peers concerning the technique of painting and scratching on film. I would like to create a book to make these processes available to artists, students, teachers and the general public. Publishing a “manual” of handmade animation film techniques titled, Scratch, Crackle and Pop: A whole grain approach to making films without a camera will highlight 30 years of aesthetic discoveries that I have made in super–8, 16 mm and 35 mm animated/experimental film production. To enrich the reader’s understanding of my process, I will enclose a DVD compilation of short films that I have created between 1982 and 2011. 

There exist a very limited number of books on handmade film. There are even fewer practical “guidebooks” on the subject of handmade film techniques. In 2010, I decided to self-publish my first filmmaking cookbook, Recipes For Reconstruction: The Cookbook for the Frugal Filmmaker. This do-it-yourself manual not only helped me promote my visibility in the field of cameraless filmmaking, it also reminded me how few artist books exist to inspire experimental filmmakers.[1]

 

This second instructional book is intended to convince developing artists to try simple, inexpensive handmade filmmaking before it becomes extinct. To many people who may only know the name of Norman McLaren, this book of will introduce established international names such as Len Lye from New Zealand, Harry Smith from The United States as well as Barber Neubauer and Pierre Hebert – and new techniques such as batiking and bleaching directly onto the surface of the film. This book will also help me to cross language barriers and talk at greater length about my processes to an international audience. 

 Technical Layout:

Scratch, Crackle and Pop will be divided into three distinctive sections. Each part will highlight the qualities and characteristics of a particular technique that I’ve used in my process (i.e. scratching, painting and brikolage) and will include a list the tools and tips for creating a successful film. Hand–drawn diagrams, film stills and photographs will also be added to support the physical production steps. Each chapter will also reference the films on the accompanying DVD. Mr. Marco DeBlois, the animation curator from the Cinematheque Quebecoise has graciously agreed both curate and edit the book for historical accuracy. As guest writer and curator, Mr. DeBlois’ chief responsibilities will ensure that the book provides a focused attention on the methodology of hand made filmmaking – a style of filmmaking where Quebec is has become a historical Mecca.

Title: "Scratch, Crackle and Pop: The Whole grains approach to making films without a camera."  

Estimated retail price: $50.00

Pages: aprox. 200

Binding: perfect bound, colour and black and white


[1] A few stand out, such as Stan Brakhage’s Giving and Taking Book [1971], Helen Hill’s Recipes For Disaster [2001] and To Boldly Go [2008. Worm Collective]. As an artist, these books pushed my constant curiosity and it inspired me to discover handmade films.

story:
To learn more about Scotti Cohn, visit www.scotticohn.com

To learn more about Christina Wald, visit www.christinawald.com

We have both been published by large houses (Scholastic, Bloomsbury, Penguin, Sylvan Dell); we want to try our hand at publishing in the world of new media.

 

* * * *

 

Why Contribute?

Wordsworth and the Dragon is a "giggle-icious" fantasy-adventure story for children in grades 3-5. I wrote it to entertain and educate, to inspire and instruct. Christina Wald's illustrations are great fun, bringing the story to life in amazing ways. By sponsoring the publication of Wordsworth and the Dragon, you will be helping to give children the gifts of laughter and learning.

The Video

I created the Wordsworth and the Dragon video using Powerpoint, adding animation and music, and finally converting the document to a .wmv file using Leowo. Watch the video to get a sense of what this book is like. I hope you enjoy it!

Synopsis

When the letter "C" is stolen out of the Royal Alphabet, the Kingdom of Atoz is thrown into a panic. No one can say or write the letter, and it has vanished from all the books in the kingdom. Sir Clooney becomes Sir Looney, and a sign in a bakery window offers "akes" and "fresh baked pie rust."

"A terrible rime has been ommitted!" wails the librarian, Lord Reading.

Hoping to prove his mettle and be named a knight by King Omicron, a young page named Wordsworth sets out to recover the letter C. A bit fearful but determined, he rides into the Forest of Spells on his trusty steed, Klause (a gift from Phrasia, the local witch). Wordsworth's quest leads him to a dragon named Dash and a village of savage creatures called muddletongues. With the help of Dash, Klause, and Princess Rho (the king's daughter), Wordsworth reclaims the letter "C" and learns the true meaning of courage and friendship -- and the value of having a whole, intact alphabet.

When readers stop giggling, they may find that they have unwittingly learned various bits of grammar and punctuation, as well as how to spell a number of useful words.

To read some of the chapters and see some of Christina's wonderful illustrations, visit the Wordsworth and the Dragon Blog!

Campaign Backstory

Back when I first decided to publish my children's book Wordsworth and the Dragon, I set about looking for an illustrator. I put the word out, emphasizing the fact that I would not be able to pay any money up front. To my surprise, a response came from Christina Wald, a top-notch professional illustrator. Christina and I had met through our mutual connection to Sylvan Dell Publishing (publisher of my three picture books). We had done a book signing together and participated in Cincinnati's annual Books by the Banks event. Christina told me that she had not had an opportunity to illustrate a fantasy story like Wordsworth in a long time, and would really enjoy doing it.

So far Christina has produced a glorious cover and is working on fantastic black-and-white illustrations -- two for each of the ten chapters.

Where Will the Money Go?

At this stage of the project, I am looking for sponsors to help with two major funding needs:

(1) In order to publish Wordsworth and the Dragon through Create Space, I will need to purchase their Total Design Freedom Children's Book Interior service. This will ensure that the text and illustrations are laid out properly and that the printed book has an attractive, professional appearance.

(2) I think it's about time Christina got paid something for her amazing work, don't you?

 Other Ways to Support the Project

Another way you can contribute to "the cause" is to purchase an item from the Wordsworth and the Dragon Zazzle store: http://www.zazzle.com/wordsworthdragon

You can also help a lot by simply sharing this indiegogo campaign with others using the "Share" buttons on this page.

 

Feel free to contact me by email if you have any questions:

sm_cohn@hotmail.com

story:
Spunk, a Summary

I had to wait until both my parents were dead, both my marriages were over, and all my children were too old to be traumatized by anything I could do in order to write my first novel for adults: Spunk--a post-apocalyptic, dystopian, urban fantasy about an Amazonian world and the woman who dares to defy its authority.

  • As Helen H. Moore I've sold thousands of books for children and educators, for such publishers as Scholastic, Mondo, and Central Recovery Press, but this new venture required a new pen-name: Helen O'Reilly.
  • I'm branching out into self-publishing and self-actualizing simultaneously. As the traditional publishing industry morphs, self-publishing has lost its stigma; it's no longer vanity publishing; it's indie publishing: this is where the cool kids are.
  • A lifelong goal has been to expand my writing repertoire to include long-form fiction--in other words, I've published children's fiction, poetry, self-help, educational and non-fiction books, but THE NOVEL has been my white whale--my Moby Dick (which is also a novel). Now the writing is done and the second part of the goal is all that remains: to publish a best-seller.
  • You will be helping me, with your contribution, fulfill my goal of seeing a novel for grown-ups, written by me, become a best-seller. (Actually, it's the first in a series.) You could be in on the conception of a book as influential as Fifty Shades of Grey, or The Hunger Games. It's better written than either of them, and loaded with sex, violence, humor, and adventure.
  • Spunk is not just a book, it's a movement; it's sexy, sassy, irreverent, fun, sly, and wicked. It's the thing that life is made of, and it keeps life interesting, exciting, and fun. Spunk is Life.

What I Need & What You Get

I need two thousand dollars:

  • to have a professionally created book trailer made,
  • to pay for registration fees and travel to 2 regional book conferences,
  • to pay for ads in conference journals and magazines.

What you will get;

All donors above $20 will be acknowledged in the Acknowledgments page of the sequel, and;

  • For donations of $1000 or more, donors willl get to name a character in the sequel.
  • For $50 up to $100, you will receive an autographed copy of the published book.
  • For $25 up to $49, you will receive an autographed author photo.
  • For donations between $5 and $24, you will receive a Spunk bumper sticker that reads: "Spunk . . .is it in you?"

If I don't reach my entire goal, I will use whatever the funds total to reach the maximum number of potential readers via the book trailer and social media marketing optiuons.

The Impact

  • This project is the culmination of a lifetime of learning, growing, and working for me, and it's proof that it's never too late to achieve your dreams. I'm a Baby Boomer, and if there's one good thing about us, it's that we still look toward the future, and what we can still accomplish in our time.
  • If the public response is what I hope it will be, this book can open a new window on love stories between older protagonists.
  • My previous books have sold thousands of copies, and I have worked in the publishing industry for most of my career and understand what it takes to market a book.
  • Like you, I am not afraid of hard work, and with a little help I know I can achieve another of my goals-- to be able to honestly list my occupation as "Writer," instead of "Editor-Writer- etc."

 Other Ways You Can Help

Times are still tough for lots of us, but even if you can't contribute money you can help:

  • Please get the word out and make some noise about my campaign.
  • Even if you can't contribute, if you tell someone about the campaign or the book, it helps; thanks!

And that’s all there is to it.

And that’s all there is to it.

story: I am a eleven year old unschooler and I have been blogging for over a year. In this blog (viyanpoonamallee.com), I have been writing stories, my views of the world, travelogues, book and game reviews and just random writing. I want to self-publish a collection of selected blog posts and new essays. Self-publishing costs money. My mother has promised to match 20% of what I raise in this campaign to publish the book. I have saved up $100 that I plan to invest in publishing this book. This book will be a window into a young unschooler's life. I would appreciate any help I can get. Thank you for considering my request. If you donate $10 or more, you will receive a copy of my book for free!

story:
Hi! My name is Cristian Mihai. I'm a Romanian self-publisher and blogger from Constanta, Romania. I write about art and stuff here.

Last year was a fantastic one. I wrote and published 4 novels, 4 short stories, and a compilation of essays about art and writing. And I wrote over 400 blog posts.

I'm pretty much a one man operation, meaning that I do most of the stuff that needs to be done in order to publish a book, from cover art to interior formatting. Basically anything, except for editing.

I'm a very prolific writer. And I can write pretty much everywhere, as long as it's my living room.

I'm a self-publisher by choice. An independent artist who does all the work himself, and tries his best to make a living out of it.

And, believe it or not, I know how difficult and frustrating the world of self-publishing can be sometimes, especially when books aren't selling very well, despite the overall positive feedback from readers.

That's why the perks are aimed at helping indie artists reach a bigger audience in exchange for a small contribution.

Your contributions will help me make ends meet, keep on writing, and release my future projects. Donations allow me to dedicate all my time to writing, blogging, and doing all the other stuff related to self-publishing.

Other Ways You Can Help

I understand that people sometimes can't afford to be charitable.

But if you don't have any money to contribute you can help out with a tweet or like. It's really simple. You just have to click on a button. And, trust me, that's enough, and it will really help me towards meeting my goal.

Thank you,

Cristian Mihai

story:
We’ll keep it short and sweet, but we can't promise to keep it fly pun-free.

Here’s the deal:  The Fly in the Head Literary Journal needs your help.  Yep, ok. We said we’d keep it short, which means no euphemisms:  Help = money. 

We need your money. Money is a scarce resource too.  We understand. We don’t need a lot, just some. Whatever money you can spare. Even linty stotinki or cents are welcome (though it may be challenging to send your lint virtually. Still, we accept all lint without question). Without your help this year’s issue will not take flight. We shall be stuck in the vast web of unprinted literature.

If you don’t know Flyinthehead here’s the buzz:The Fly was founded in 2004 by Professor Michael Harris Cohen and has published ten issues to date.  

The Fly features fiction and poetry (and photographs on occasion) from the students of the American University in Bulgaria and other Balkan writers.  And yes Virginia, it’s all in English.  In fact, as far as we know, it was the first English Literary magazine in the Balkans featuring Balkan only writers. We’re mighty proud of that.

Yes, we’re biased.  But we believe the Fly consistently prints top shelf writing.  We favor material that pushes the envelope and it’s amazing to see what these young polyglots can do. We hope you’ll think the same and be prepared to back it up with a small but much appreciated contribution.

Our funding goal is one thousand leva (about 700 bucks). This will be enough to cover printing and layout.  If there’s any money left over, it will go toward next year’s issue.

We appreciate you taking the time to read this. Thanks especially to those who donate and/or spread the word about our fundraiser!

story:
I am Casey Rocheteau. I am a working class, mixed race, poet, historian and activist. I am trying to get to Bread Loaf Writer's Conference in Sicily, Italy in late September 2014. You can find out more about the prestigious Bread Loaf Writers' Conference here: Bread Loaf in Sicily

I need to get this money to Bread Loaf by July 7th, which is very short notice. I was recently informed a spot opened up for me, and I was pulled from the wait list. In order to get there, I'm going to need your help. It is essential that working class/poor writers of color have access to these kinds of spaces, but it's not always immediately feasible. What you are contributing is not simply about fulfilling dreams but also equity in artistic spaces.

What I Need

Cost of attendance for Bread Loaf in Sicily is $2790, which does not include airfare.

Airfare from New York City, where I live, to Palermo, Italy will be an additional $900-$1400.

What You Get

A $5 or $10 donation will get you a personalized postcard from Sicily from Casey with a poem just for you!

A $25 donation will get you a personalized postcard and a signed copy of Casey's one of Casey's two albums (your choice) with the Whitehaus Family Record.

A $50 donation will get you a personalized postcard, a signed copy of one of Casey's two albums (your choice), and a signed copy of Knocked Up On Yes, Casey's 2012 book on Sargent Press.

A $100 donation will get you a signed copy of Knocked Up On Yes, and a 90 minute American history or poetry writing workshop, via Skype (or in person if feasible) with Casey based on your interests.

A $250 donation will get you a signed copy of Knocked Up On Yes, and two 60 minute American history or poetry writing workshops, via Skype (or in person if feasible) with Casey based on your interests.

A $500 donation will get you three 60 minute American history or poetry writing workshops via Skype or in person, a small glass jar filled with tears of gratitude or a tarot reading by Casey, and a poem written for you by Casey, the subject of which you can request.

A $1000 donation will get you the entire Casey Rocheteau Library (4 chapbooks, one book, two CDs), three 90 minute American history or poetry writing workshops via Skype or in person, a small glass jar filled with tears of gratitude or a tarot reading by Casey a poem written for you by Casey, the subject of which you can request, a personalized care package of baked goods and a piece of visual poetic artwork just for you!

Dependent upon how much money is raised in the next few weeks, I may not hit my immediate goal. Bread Loaf is working with me to split payments for the conference, but I need $1395 by July 7th, and another $1395 by July 31st. I am working on pulling money from other resources, but if I make anywhere near the goal of $3750, the funds will still go towards paying for and traveling to Bread Loaf in Sicily. If there are not enough funds to travel to Bread Loaf, the money will be set aside and will go towards the travel and costs of another writing workshop or fellowship, such as returning to Cave Canem.

Impact, Risks & Challenges

While this is certainly about equity for one individual, there is a great significance in financially supporting a working-class woman of color in the writing world. As an activist and teacher, I have worked within the slam poetry community, academia, public schools and currently at a girl's leadership summer camp to work towards building more anti-oppressive, equitable communities. This is an opportunity to grow as an individual and as a writer in a space that is otherwise financially inaccessible to myself and other writers with similar identities. If the Vida Count is any indicator, it is essential to support women writers in publishing, fellowships, workshops and conferences. You don't need more stats to understand that queer, working-class women of color face added challenges in addition to gender bias.

Other Ways You Can Help

If you can't donate, please just share the link to the campaign! It helps just as much as donating!
